Major Turns/Instructions: TURN LEFT out of High School parking lot onto Pso De Las Escuelis
TURN LEFT at STOP SIGN onto Moreno St

Landmarks/Notes: Stop Sign (All-Way) for South Pacific St

Major Turns/Instructions: TURN RIGHT at STOP SIGN onto New Mexico Ave/NM-329 South/N. Mex. Ave
TURN LEFT at SL onto 7th St

Landmarks/Notes: Storrie Lake State Park on left

Major Turns/Instructions: TURNAROUND at Jct NM-94 at Sapello Phillips 66 gas station and follow NM518 back to Las Vegas
Landmarks/Notes: 3 entrances/exits - you may use whichever one you would like to/  is safe to do so to turnaround
